TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ZipArchiveEntry extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 zip 封存中的壓縮檔。

span.span: Represents a compressed file within a zip archive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Zip 封存包含每個壓縮檔案的項目。A zip archive contains an entry for each compressed file. 類別可讓您檢查的項目時，內容和開啟或刪除的項目。The class enables you to examine the properties of an entry, and open or delete the entry. 當您開啟項目時，您可以修改壓縮的檔案寫入該壓縮的檔案資料流。When you open an entry, you can modify the compressed file by writing to the stream for that compressed file. 方法，以操作的 zip 封存和其檔案項目會分散到三個類別： ，和。The methods for manipulating zip archives and their file entries are spread across three classes: , and . |若要...To…|請使用於…Use…| |---------|----------| |從目錄中建立 zip 封存Create a zip archive from a directory|| |解壓縮 zip 封存至目錄的內容Extract the contents of a zip archive to a directory|| |將新檔案新增至現有的 zip 封存Add new files to an existing zip archive|| |擷取 zip 封存中的檔案Retrieve an file in a zip archive|| |擷取所有的 zip 封存中的檔案Retrieve all of the files in a zip archive|| |若要開啟個別的檔案資料流所包含之 zip 封存中To open a stream to an individual file contained in a zip archive|| |從 zip 封存中刪除檔案Delete a file from a zip archive|| 如果您參考`System.IO.Compression.FileSystem`專案中的組件，您可以存取兩個擴充方法類別。If you reference the `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly in your project, you can access two extension methods for the class. 這些方法都和，可讓您解壓縮到檔案項目的內容。Those methods are and , and they enable you to decompress the contents of the entry to a file. `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem`組件不適用於[!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)]。The `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly is not available in [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)]. 中[!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]應用程式，您可以使用解壓縮的封存內容或，或者您可以使用[!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)]類型[壓縮程式](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=246357)並[解壓縮程式](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=246358)至壓縮及解壓縮檔案。In [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps, you can decompress the contents of an archive by using or , or you can use the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] types [Compressor](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=246357) and [Decompressor](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=246358) to compress and decompress files. ## Examples 第一個範例示範如何在 zip 封存中建立新的項目，並寫入其中。The first example shows how to create a new entry in a zip archive and write to it. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchivemode/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchivemode/vb/program1.vb#1)] 第二個範例示範如何使用擴充方法。The second example shows how to use the extension method. 您必須參考`System.IO.Compression.FileSystem`来執行的程式碼專案中的組件。You must reference the `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly in your project for the code to execute. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 無法擷取此屬性，當模式設定為，或將模式設為，並且已經開啟的項目。This property cannot be retrieved when the mode is set to , or the mode is set to and the entry has been opened. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何擷取 zip 封存中的項目，並評估的屬性項目。The following example shows how to retrieve entries in a zip archive, and evaluate the properties of the entries. 它會使用屬性顯示名稱的項目，而和; 屬性來計算多少檔案已壓縮。It uses the property to display the name of the entry, and the and properties to calculate how much the file was compressed. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchiveentry/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchiveentry/vb/program1.vb#1)]

span.span: The value of the property is not available because the entry has been modified.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ExternalAttributes { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.ExternalAttributes : int with get, set

summary.span: OS 和應用程式專用的檔案屬性。

span.span: OS and application specific file attributes.

value.span: 寫入此項目時應用程式所寫入的外部屬性。

span.span: The external attributes written by the application when this entry was written.

value.span: 其同時為主機 OS 和應用程式的相依項。

span.span: It is both host OS and application dependent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 外部屬性的對應是主機系統相依。The mapping of the external attributes is host-system dependent. MS-DOS 的低序位位元組會是 MS-DOS 目錄屬性位元組。For MS-DOS, the low order byte is the MS-DOS directory attribute byte. For Unix 中，最高位元組經常用來儲存檔案的權限。For Unix, the high Order byte is frequently used to store the file permissions. 如果輸入是來自標準輸入中，此欄位設為零。If input came from standard input, this field is set to zero.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property FullName As String
public: property System::String ^ FullName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 Zip 封存中的項目相對路徑。

span.span: Gets the relative path of the entry in the zip archive.

value.span: Zip 封存中的項目相對路徑。

span.span: The relative path of the entry in the zip archive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含相對路徑，包括子目錄的階層架構，zip 封存中的項目。The property contains the relative path, including the subdirectory hierarchy, of an entry in a zip archive. (相較之下，屬性只包含名稱的項目，而且不包含子目錄階層架構。)比方說，如果您在 zip 封存中建立兩個項目使用方法，並提供`NewEntry.txt`做為第一個項目名稱並`AddedFolder\\NewEntry.txt`這兩個項目都會有第二個項目，如`NewEntry.txt`中屬性。(In contrast, the property contains only the name of the entry and does not include the subdirectory hierarchy.) For example, if you create two entries in a zip archive by using the method and provide `NewEntry.txt` as the name for the first entry and `AddedFolder\\NewEntry.txt` for the second entry, both entries will have `NewEntry.txt` in the property. 第一個項目也會有`NewEntry.txt`中屬性，但第二個項目會有`AddedFolder\\NewEntry.txt`在屬性。The first entry will also have `NewEntry.txt` in the property, but the second entry will have `AddedFolder\\NewEntry.txt` in the property. 您可以指定任何字串做為路徑的項目，包括指定無效和絕對路徑的字串。You can specify any string as the path of an entry, including strings that specify invalid and absolute paths. 因此，屬性可能包含格式不正確的值。Therefore, the property might contain a value that is not correctly formatted. 當您解壓縮 zip 封存的內容無效或絕對路徑可能會導致例外狀況。An invalid or absolute path might result in an exception when you extract the contents of the zip archive. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何逐一查看的內容為.zip 檔案，並包含.txt 為副檔名的檔案解壓縮。The following example shows how to iterate through the contents of a .zip file, and extract files that contain the .txt extension. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property DateTimeOffset LastWriteTime { DateTimeOffset get(); void set(DateTimeOffset value); };
member this.LastWriteTime : DateTimeOffset with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定上次變更 zip 封存中之項目的時間。

span.span: Gets or sets the last time the entry in the zip archive was changed.

value.span: 上次變更 zip 封存中之項目的時間。

span.span: The last time the entry in the zip archive was changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您建立新的項目從現有的檔案藉由呼叫方法，修改屬性的項目會自動設定為最後一次檔案。When you create a new entry from an existing file by calling the method, the property for the entry is automatically set to the last time the file was modified. 當您建立新的項目以程式設計方式透過呼叫方法，的項目會自動設定為執行的時間。When you create a new entry programmatically by calling the method, the property for the entry is automatically set to the time of execution. 如果您修改的項目時，您必須明確設定屬性，如果您想要以反映最新變更的時間值。If you modify the entry, you must explicitly set the property if you want the value to reflect the time of the latest change. 當您設定此屬性，值會轉換成特定 zip 封存的時間戳記格式。When you set this property, the value is converted to a timestamp format that is specific to zip archives. 此格式支援的解析度為兩秒。This format supports a resolution of two seconds. 最早的允許的值是 1980 年 1 月 1 0: 00:00 （午夜）。The earliest permitted value is 1980 January 1 0:00:00 (midnight). 最新的允許的值為 2107 年 12 月 31 日 23:59:58 （午夜前一秒）。The latest permitted value is 2107 December 31 23:59:58 (one second before midnight). 如果上次寫入時間的值不是有效的屬性會傳回預設值是 1980 年 1 月 1 0: 00:00 （午夜）。If the value for the last write time is not valid, the property returns a default value of 1980 January 1 0:00:00 (midnight). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何開啟 zip 封存中的項目、 修改它，並設定屬性設為目前時間。The following example shows how to open an entry in a zip archive, modify it, and set the property to the current time. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchiveentry/cs/program2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchiveentry/vb/program2.vb#2)]

exception.span: 嘗試設定這個屬性失敗，因為項目的 zip 封存處於模式。

span.span: The attempt to set this property failed, because the zip archive for the entry is in mode.
The archive mode is set to .
-or-

exception.span: 封存模式設定為 ，並且已經開啟該項目。

span.span: The archive mode is set to and the entry has been opened.

exception.span: 已嘗試將這個屬性設定為早於 1980 年 1 月 1 日 0:00:00 (午夜) 或晚於 2107 年 12 月 31 日 23:59:58 (午夜前一秒)。

span.span: An attempt was made to set this property to a value that is either earlier than 1980 January 1 0:00:00 (midnight) or later than 2107 December 31 23:59:58 (one second before midnight).

summary.span: 取得 Zip 封存中的項目檔名。

span.span: Gets the file name of the entry in the zip archive.

value.span: Zip 封存中的項目檔名。

span.span: The file name of the entry in the zip archive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含的部分遵循的最後一個目錄分隔符號字元的屬性 (\\)，而且不包含子目錄的階層。The property contains the portion of the property that follows the final directory separator character (\\), and does not include the subdirectory hierarchy. 比方說，如果您在 zip 封存中建立兩個項目使用方法，並提供`NewEntry.txt`做為第一個項目名稱並`AddedFolder\\NewEntry.txt`這兩個項目都會有第二個項目，如`NewEntry.txt`中屬性。For example, if you create two entries in a zip archive by using the method and provide `NewEntry.txt` as the name for the first entry and `AddedFolder\\NewEntry.txt` for the second entry, both entries will have `NewEntry.txt` in the property. 第一個項目也會有`NewEntry.txt`中屬性，但第二個項目會有`AddedFolder\\NewEntry.txt`在屬性。The first entry will also have `NewEntry.txt` in the property, but the second entry will have `AddedFolder\\NewEntry.txt` in the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何擷取 zip 封存中的項目，並評估項目屬性。The following example shows how to retrieve entries from a zip archive and evaluate the properties of the entries. 它會使用屬性顯示名稱的項目，而和; 屬性來計算多少檔案已壓縮。It uses the property to display the name of the entry, and the and properties to calculate how much the file was compressed. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchiveentry/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchiveentry/vb/program1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.IO.Stream Open() cil managed

summary.span: 從 zip 封存中開啟項目。

span.span: Opens the entry from the zip archive.

returns.span: 代表此項目內容的資料流。

span.span: The stream that represents the contents of the entry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法來存取資料流的 zip 封存中的項目。You use this method to access the stream for an entry in a zip archive. 擷取資料流之後, 您可以讀取或寫入資料流。After retrieving the stream, you can read from or write to the stream. 當您撰寫資料流時，您對項目所做的修改會出現在 zip 封存中。When you write to the stream, the modifications you make to the entry will appear in the zip archive. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立新的項目，請開啟它方法，並寫入資料流。The following example shows how to create a new entry, open it with the method, and write to the stream. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchivemode/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchivemode/vb/program1.vb#1)]

exception.span: 項目目前已經開啟供寫入。

-or-
The entry has been deleted from the archive.

span.span: The entry is either missing from the archive or is corrupt and cannot be read.
-or-

span.span: The entry has been compressed by using a compression method that is not supported.

exception.span: 這個項目的 Zip 封存已經過處置。

span.span: The zip archive for this entry has been disposed.
